pkgmetadata.longdescription: Network-Based Regularization for Generalized Linear Models // Network-based regularization has achieved success in variable selection for high-dimensional biological data due to its ability to incorporate correlations among genomic features. This package provides procedures of network-based variable selection for generalized linear models. Two recent additions are the robust network regularization for the survival response and the network regularization for continuous response. Functions for other regularization methods will be included in the forthcoming upgraded versions.
